name: Douglas MARTIN and Kimberly Martin, His Wife, Plaintiffs-Petitioners, v. BANK OF AMERICA, Defendant-Respondent, and MGCC Group of Companies, et al., Defendants, and M.G.C.C. Group, Inc., et al., Third-Party Plaintiffs, v. Township of Howell, Third-Party Defendant.

court.name: New Jersey Court of Errors and Appeals

parties:
Douglas MARTIN and Kimberly Martin, His Wife, Plaintiffs-Petitioners,
v.
BANK OF AMERICA, Defendant-Respondent,
and
MGCC Group of Companies, et al., Defendants,
and
M.G.C.C. Group, Inc., et al., Third-Party Plaintiffs,
v.

opinions.text:
A petition for certification of the judgment in A-002128-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;
It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
